channel.title: Moving a npc
channel.description:
Hi, i want to move the Mage of Zamorak npc to my servers home, but idk how thats why im posting this.. if someone can tell me how that would be great and ill rep :d Source: 317 Airscape - [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459744.msg3363860.html#msg3363860]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459744.msg3363860.html#msg3363860[/url]
if you need any more info just ask

item.title: Moving a npc
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“staypuff, post:4, topic:366182”][quote author=EMINEM BEAST™ link=topic=462383.msg3382581#msg3382581 date=1288160496]
Uhm… I don’t know if you know this or not but this topic is for people that need help with ther server… So how about you help or gtfo? and for your information my server is running.
[/quote]

Correction, Moparscape’s help section’s server is running. If you can’t move an npc, it is hard to believe that you have done anything worthwhile to “our” server that wasn’t the work and codes of somebody else.[/quote]
Ha, I love the way you say “our server” like your one of thos people that actually help out.

Read full topic

item.title: Moving a npc
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

Dude, it would be ok if you had 2 or 3 problems or maybe even 4 or 5 spread out over a bit about real issues. There are plenty of tutorials out there and more the half the stuff you post is common sense.

If you ever get your server running your going to have to give 99.99% of your credit to the people of this forum as it seems we are doing nothing but spoon feeding you.

Tip-Use the search bar!

Read full topic
